news.title: Security and Platform Upgrades, Multiverse progress
news.body:
Progress has resumed with a round of security and platform upgrades, and some major re-organizations to work with latest Multiverse backend server updates. Multiverse server was migrated to Typescript and initial end-to-end core platform implemented, though much work remains to adding game and simulation logic.

After initial simulation logic is added, we're hoping to expand multiplayer and network testing in 2023; join Discord for more updates
items: website platform nuxt upgrades
began conversion to typescript
added real-time network browser-server socket communication
progress Multiverse server platform, threading and persistence

news.title: Happy New Year!
news.body: Big round of updates adding several new menus, with basic API integrations and Multiverse logic. Rendering improvements to support building signs and interface changes to support inspect menus, including initial versions for townhalls and trade centers.
items: game menus including chat, rankings, search, and politics
building signs and initial inspect menus
position history and jump-to widget
additional API integrations for game data

news.title: Dependency Upgrades, Pre-Alpha Multiverse support
news.body: Core logic updates and initial support for Tycoon, Corporation, and Company creation, plus a round of technology dependency upgrades. More client changes to align with Multiverse server API, with first successful connections to running backend server. Multiverse backend server still not ready for public, but progress has been made towards pre-alpha testing.
items: upgrade dependencies
basic Tycoon, Corporation, and Company creation interfaces
initial Multiverse server API integration

news.title: Dependency Upgrades, Documentation, and Internal API Progress
news.body: Round of dependency upgrades, documentation, and core logic updates. Lots of internal website client changes to align with Multiverse server API and library types. Progress also made towards first version of the Multiverse backend server.
items: upgrade dependencies
library types and documentation for Multiverse API
sandbox and internal logic alignment with Multiverse API

news.title: New Year, New Milestone
news.body:
Happy New Year!

We're excited to announce STARPEACE client v0.3.0 with initial building construction gameplay and menu integration! With sufficient cash, research, and other requirements, buildings can be selected for construction and placed on available land or water.

This also concludes the v0.2.x project milestone; see archives for full history. Visit the release notes to learn more about upcoming features and the focus of the next client milestone.
items: initial building industry and warehouse resource metadata
building construction menu and basic game-map integration

news.title: Client News, improved Systems and Planet menus, and initial internal AJAX structure!
news.body:
Hi everyone!

We're pleased to introduce the STARPEACE client news widget for game updates and other announcements! Watch this space for feature change details, follow on Twitter, or checkout the release notes for version feature information.

Also further improved corporation, system, and planets workflows and selection interfaces, integrating client login state management and placeholder server AJAX API calls with dummy data responses.
items: client updates UI and recent news integration
improved system and planet selection interface; integration with corporation and existing companies information
improved tycoon login workflow, simulated authorization sequence, placeholder game and player metadata
initial AJAX structure for server API calls, placeholder dummy data responses
